Posts.Content: May 22, 2018 06:13AM - edited May 22, 2018 06:18AM by Geeper Hello, dx with stage 4 TN Inflammatory Breast Cancer 12/17/2015 de novo with mets to lung and brain. Currently on Gemzar/Carbo combo and take full extract cannabis oil. NED from the neck down. Lepto enhancement 12/2017, followed by 2 brain MRI's that show shrinkage. I've had 2 SRS treatments, last being 02/2017. No WBR. Prayers, and chemo with full extract cannabis oil are keeping me here. Doing well. üôè
